programme.desc: Ryan and the WCC crew work the cars for the rich and famous. They reach for the stars and please the wealthy as they transform junk into living jewels.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S1 Ep107
programme.desc: Paddington is accidentally delivered inside a wardrobe to Mr. Curry's house and must get out quickly. // Paddington tries to help Judy with her geography homework and ends up being the subject of it.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S1 Ep108
programme.desc: Mr Brown has forgotten about Mrs Brown's Birthday so Paddington decides to hold a surprise party. // Judy does not like Violin lessons so she hides from Ms Potts. Paddington takes up the challenge...

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep144
programme.desc: Peppa and George go to the playground. Peppa likes the swings but George doesn't because he's scared of heights, so Daddy Pig helps George go down the slide as it is too high and ends up getting stuck.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep145
programme.desc: Daddy Pig offers to put up a picture of Peppa and George on the wall while Mummy Pig is out. He cracks the wall while doing it, so Peppa and George help Daddy Pig fix the wall before Mummy Pig comes home.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep146
programme.desc: Peppa and her family go to the beach, and they do lots of things there including burying Daddy Pig in the sand. When it's time to go they almost leave without Daddy Pig as he has fallen asleep.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep147
programme.desc: George finds a spider in the bathroom sink, but Peppa is really frightened-until she realizes that it doesn't want to hurt her.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S5 Ep516
programme.desc: When showman Gil's 'real live dragon' (actually a Komodo Dragon) gets loose in Bubbleville, it's up to Pet Finders Oona and Zooli to track the lizard down and return it to its home on Komodo Island.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S2 Ep203
programme.desc: Cap'n McStripes (that's ''pirate'' for Josh) and Blue are playing pirates, but where is the treasure?! We play Blue's Clues to figure it out.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S2 Ep204
programme.desc: It's a sweet day at Blue's Bakery as they are baking bibingka, a cake from the Philippines! We play Blue's Clues to figure out who Blue wants to bake for, and help the Banana Baker with her Monkey Muffins!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S5 Ep514
programme.desc: Blaze and AJ are babysitting for Baby Gherkin! When it's time for her nap, they tell her three epic bedtime stories about police, cowboys, and superheroes - all starring Blaze and his friends!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S1 Ep101
programme.desc: When Santiago discovers the lost treasure of the legendary Capitn Calavera, he and his friends become the new Pirate Protectors of Isla Encanto.

programme.title: Paw Patrol S3 Ep308
programme.desc: Daring Danny X takes his ambitions too far when he attempts a jump over Rattle Snake Canyon! The Paw Patrol wows with a mid-air rescue.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S3 Ep311
programme.desc: Ryder and the pups must fly to the Arctic in the Air Patroller to rescue the lost cubs. // When little lambs keep running away from Farmer Al's pasture, it's up to the Paw Patrol to find the missing sheep.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S1 Ep118
programme.desc: Mr. Gruber has been loaned a T-Rex Skeleton, but Lucky the dog has stolen and buried it! // The kids decide to form a rock band with Paddington, but what instrument should he play, and what is rock music?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S3 Ep311
programme.desc: Peppa and George go boating with Grandpa Pig and Polly Parrot, but later Grandpa Pig drops his mobile phone into the water.
